alert.note: Alert for Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 11:21AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Oneida County through 1145 AM EDT... At 1120 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stittville, or 8 miles north of Utica, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Floyd, Holland Patent, Barneveld, Barnveld, Stittville and Trenton Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
